listAsq.title: How can I sell my TV online?
listAsq.content: Sell your TV with our service is quick and straightforward. We've streamlined our evaluation process to make it as simple as possible. Just send us photos of your TV and its model number through your preferred communication channel (Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, iMessage, Telegram, Instagram, or email). Within 10 minutes, you'll receive a precise quote along with detailed instructions for the next steps.

listAsq.title: Do you offer pickup service?
listAsq.content: Yes, we provide complimentary TV pickup service anywhere in Florida, typically on the same day you contact us. Alternatively, you can bring your TV to one of our convenient office locations in Miami, Orlando, Tampa, or Jacksonville. Both options are available to suit your preferences and schedule.

listAsq.title: How can I maximize my TV's value?
listAsq.content: Preparation is key to securing the best possible price for your TV. We recommend thoroughly cleaning the unit to remove dust and debris, performing a factory reset of the system, and including all available accessories such as remote controls, TV tuners, Wi-Fi adapters, and mounting brackets. Having the original documentation, receipt, and packaging will add extra value to your sale.

listAsq.title: What types of TVs do you buy?
listAsq.content: We actively purchase a wide range of TV technologies including LED, OLED, QLED, LCD, 4K UHD, HDR, Smart TV, 3D, Curved, Plasma, Full HD, NanoCell, Edge-lit LED, Direct-lit LED, Mini LED, Wide Color Gamut, Dolby Vision, and Ambient Mode displays. We accept all major brands including Samsung, LG, Sony, Vizio, TCL, Hisense, Panasonic, Philips, Sharp, Insignia, Toshiba, Sceptre, Westinghouse, RCA, and Element.

listAsq.title: When do I receive payment?
listAsq.content: After we confirm our online quote, our specialist will visit your location. If the TV's condition, accessories, and appearance match what you've described, the quoted price remains unchanged. Following a thorough inspection and functionality test, you'll receive immediate payment through your preferred method - bank check, cash, or direct bank transfer.

listAsq.title: Which areas do you serve?
listAsq.content:
We provide service throughout Florida, with extensive coverage across the state's major regions:
North Florida: Jacksonville, Tallahassee, Gainesville, Pensacola, Panama City, Lake City, St. Augustine, Fernandina Beach, Live Oak, and Fort Walton Beach, as well as surrounding communities.
Central Florida: Orlando, Tampa, St. Petersburg, Clearwater, Lakeland, Daytona Beach, Melbourne, Ocala, The Villages, and Winter Haven, plus neighboring areas.
South Florida: Miami, Fort Lauderdale, West Palm Beach, Boca Raton, Hollywood, Pompano Beach, Coral Springs, Homestead, Naples, and Fort Myers, including all adjacent cities and suburbs.
